question: Sumner Redstone, who has recently passed away, is associated with which field?
explanation:
American businessperson and veteran media giant Sumner Redstone, has recently passed away at the age of 97 years.
During his long tenure in the field of media, he built a great media empire including CBS and Viacom serving as the Executive Chairmen of both companies. He was also the Chairman of the Board of National Amusements theatre chain. Redstone's autobiography was titled “A Passion to Win”.
